data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Nueva Segovia, Nicaragua a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nueva Segovia, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nueva Segovia, Nicaragua.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Nueva Segovia, Nicaragua by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 90,653 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Nueva Segovia prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Nueva Segovia to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 90,653 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

location.name: Nueva Segovia
location.cities_list: Ocotal, Jalapa, Quilalí, San Fernando, Mozonte
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ocotal (33,928), Jalapa (24,037), Quilalí (13,590), San Fernando (3,899), Mozonte (2,338)
